titles: For the plantation in Virginia. Or Nova Britannia
author: Virginia Company of London.
notes: Announcement of an intended voyage to Virginia, and the terms on which laborers will be accepted as colonists.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Smith, Thomas, --  Sir, 1558?-1625 --  Early works to 1800.
